title: Did the Trump Department finance the development of the COVID-19 vaccine?
subtitle: Approval for the purchase of a vaccine once approved is not the same to fund its research and development.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Research and development in the HIV/AIDS vaccine, which proved to be 90 per cent effective against SARS-COV-2 in November 2020, was funded by the process of speeding up the United States President Donald Trump.
